item.title: A Gentle Introduction to Deep Learning
item.description: Read this if you have: Basic computer programming knowledge Want to know what the hype is behind ‘deep learning’ Fundamentals DL vs. ML vs. AI AI To begin to understand deep learning, we must understand the difference between deep learning (DL), machine learning (ML), and artifical intelligence (AI). Let's address artifical intelligence first. AI is intelligent behavior exhibited by computer programs. It can be as simple as using if statements.
